summary: BlockwiseDep is a lightweight descriptor that represents an indexable I/O dependency within a Dask Blockwise layer. It stores the shape of the block grid (numblocks) and a flag indicating whether the dependency yields nested tasks (produces_tasks). Instances can be used in place of concrete collection names when defining Blockwise operations, allowing new collections to be materialized on‑the‑fly during execution.
business_intent: Enable dynamic creation and tracking of I/O‑based collections inside blockwise computations, facilitating lazy, partition‑aware data flow without requiring pre‑existing Dask collections.
